verbs.description: president [V: trump] [ARG1: first lady] leave pittsburgh after trip to synagogue hospital president donald trump and first lady melania trump visited pittsburgh on tuesday in the wake of a shooting at tree of life synagogue in the squirrel hill neighborhood that killed 11 people squirrel hill rabbi jeffrey myers pittsburgh international airport pittsburgh donald trump tree of life synagogue president president donald trump president trump
